en_description: One point for each green touching the edge of the map.
One point for each green surrounded on all four sides (or map edge).
Three points for each mountain space connected to another mountain via a chain of greens.
One point for each row and column with at least one green. The same green can count for both row+column.
Two points for each blue adjacent to a mountain. One point for each yellow adjacent to a mountain.
Three points for each individual blue/yellow cluster, but no points if it touches the map edge or the opposite color.
One point for each blue adjacent to a ruins spaces. Three points for each yellow on a ruins space.
One point for each blue adjacent to at least one yellow and each yellow adjacent to at least one blue.
Eight points for each cluster of reds that is at least 6 spaces.
One point for each red space in the largest cluster of reds that is not touching a mountain.
Two points for each space in the second largest cluster of reds.
Three points for each cluster of reds that is adjacent to at least 3 different other terrain types.
Three points for each complete diagonal line of filled spaces that touches the left and bottom edges of map.
One point for each empty square surrounded on all four sides (or map edge).
Six points for each complete row and column.
Three points for each space along one edge of the largest square of filled spaces. (2 x 2 square = 2*3 points)
Earn two reputation stars for each forest space in the longest unbroken column of forest spaces.
Earn six reputation stars for each cluster of five or more forest spaces that is not adjacent to any village spaces.
Earn two reputation stars for each forest space surrounded on all four sides by forest spaces or the edge of the map.
Earn four reputation stars for each row that contains three or more forest spaces.
Earn seven reputation stars for each cluster of farm spaces adjacent to three or more water spaces.
Earn four reputation stars for each water space adjacent to two or more farm spaces.
Earn five reputation stars for each mountain space connected to a farm space by a cluster of water spaces.
Earn four reputation stars for each column that contains an equal number of farm spaces and water spaces. There must be at least one of each.
Earn seven reputation stars for each cluster of village spaces that contains four spaces in a 4x1 or 1x4 rectangle.
Choose a cluster of village spaces and earn one reputation star for each empty space adjacent to that cluster.
Earn six reputation stars for each cluster of village spaces that contains four spaces in a 2x2 square.
Choose a cluster of village spaces and earn one reputation star for each row and column that contains a space from that cluster.
Earn seven reputation stars for each complete row or complete column of filled spaces that contains a mountain space.
Earn ten reputation stars for each complete odd numbered column of filled spaces.
Earn four reputation stars for each row that contains five or more different terrain types.
Earn four reputation stars for each cluster of exactly three empty spaces surrounded on all sides by filled spaces or the edge of the map.
